description: Update the code signing configuration for the function. Changes to the code signing configuration take effect the next time a user tries to deploy a code package to the function.

parameters.name: CodeSigningConfigArn
parameters.description: The The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the code signing configuration.

parameters.name: FunctionName
parameters.description: The name or ARN of the Lambda function. Function name - MyFunction. Function ARN - arn:aws:lambda:us-west-2:123456789012:function:MyFunction. Partial ARN - 123456789012:function:MyFunction. The length constraint applies only to the full ARN. If you specify only the function name, it is limited to 64 characters in length.

nested_items.name: CodeSigningConfigArn
nested_items.description: The The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the code signing configuration.

nested_items.name: FunctionName
nested_items.description: The name or ARN of the Lambda function.
